description.en: EarnzCoin is a multifaceted Digital Currency that is X-11 based with PoW/PoS and is the first of its kind in an ever growing market it will also have a Lock-in platform, a Referral program and will be ASIC miner friendly. However, the best feature of all that EarnzCoin brings to the table is that it is the first and only Lock-in coin that also offers integrated working Masternodes.
